Frequency once per day

Trigger You're reduced to 0 hit points and don't immediately die.

This life still holds much for you, and you aren't ready to fall back into the River of Souls just yet. When you're reduced to 0 Hit Points and not immediately killed, you go to 1 Hit Point instead, fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone], and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious], and you don't gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Wounded]{Wounded 1} condition.
